answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Pam, 
I have been able to find a few more pigeon related resources on the Knowledge Network that your member might find useful. 
Here are a few old questions from last year dealing with similar pigeon issues. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/22192
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21637
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20166
I hope that your member finds the resources provided in the answers of these questions useful. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for resolutions from other municipalities regarding “an increasing pigeon population/problem”.  I was successful in finding the following information, but am hoping you will have additional information, resources, and results. Do you or your community have any suggestions?
US Humane Society - What to Do About Pigeons
http://www.humanesociety.org/animals/pigeons/tips/solving_problems_pigeons.html#.UqC37dJDvYg 
Pigeon Control Resource Center -  REDUCING PIGEON NUMBERS IN TOWNS & CITIES
http://www.pigeoncontrolresourcecentre.org/html/reducing-pigeon-numbers-in-towns.html 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
www.tlgconference.org
title: Increasing Pigeon Problem
